allow: Bash(do sed -i 's/123 Health Street/2971 136 Ave NW #240C/g' "$file")

Bash(python3 -c " import re with open(''$file'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f: content = f.read() content = re.sub(r''
    .*?
'', '''', content, flags=re.DOTALL) with open(''$file'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f: f.write(content) ")
